data.eml:eml: Aeolothrips eremicola (Thysanoptera, Aeolothripidae): first record of the male from Iran

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Alavi, Jalil, Fekrat, Lida, Awal, Mehdi Modarres, Zolfaghari, Maryam, Minaei, Kambiz (2013): Aeolothrips eremicola (Thysanoptera, Aeolothripidae): first record of the male from Iran. Zootaxa 3683 (3): 289-291, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3683.3.5
